prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that has a fiery look with spiky red features.
I want an adorable creature that blends fire and insect traits with a bright color palette.
Generate a small Pokemon that exudes a warm glow, perfect for a forest environment.
Make a unique bug/fire hybrid Pokemon that has a cute, yet fierce appearance.
Imagine a Pokemon with a fiery personality that thrives in wooded areas and has a unique design.
Design a vibrant creature that showcases the beauty of fire and nature with distinct colors.
Show me a Pokemon that has an eye-catching red and white color scheme and a charming design.

distinctive_features: Spiky red protrusions on the head
Brownish lower body resembling a cocoon
